translation.ko: 간호사들 말로는 먼로 씨가 혼자 와서 머리를 치료받았다더군요

translation.en: -wishing to be seen for a head injury. -Peri was admitted.
translation.ko: 먼로 씨가 혼자 와서 머리를 치료받았다더군요 치료는 페리가 받았어요

translation.en: Where's her file? Where's her file?
Can we take this to my office, please?
Gotta be a record somewhere, right? For patients admitted.
translation.ko: 어딘가 기록이 남았죠? 환자가 접수한 기록요

translation.en: I wasn't on call then.
Sometimes files get misplaced
translation.ko: 환자 파일은 분실되기도 하고 엉뚱한 이름 밑에 들어가기도 해요

translation.en: or they get filed under the wrong name. Maybe it wasn't entered into the system.
translation.ko: 환자 파일은 분실되기도 하고 엉뚱한 이름 밑에 들어가기도 해요 입력이 안 될 때도 있고요

translation.en: These things happen.
You're full of shit.
You should call that Dr. Berthram, all right?
He sent Peri to get the CAT scan, and that was the last time I saw him.
translation.ko: 그분이 페리의 검사를 지시했는데 그때 후로 못 봤어요

translation.en: Call... Dr. Berthram.
This is ridiculous.
Where's Dr. Berthram?
He went off call. He's probably at home.
Well, if he can sort this out, it's probably worth giving him a call, right?
translation.ko: 그분이 이 문제를 해결해 준다면 전화하는 게 낫죠

translation.en: Right?
[Lucado] Call Gabe.
[officer 1] Where do you do the CAT scans?
Um... our imaging lab's on the third floor.
[officer 1] Okay. Take us up there please.
Take them up to three.
[Ray] Hang on.
The CAT scans are downstairs.
-No, our imaging lab's on the third floor. -[Ray] No, no, no.
No, I saw them get in an elevator and go down.
He's obviously confused. Our lab is on three.
translation.ko: 저 사람이 헷갈린 겁니다 영상 의학과는 3층이에요

translation.en: Can you take us up there, please?
[Lucado] This computer keeps a log of usage.
There's date, time, and duration.
You can see this machine was used at 9:07 a.m.
for a duration lasting exactly 29 minutes.
And that was the last time.
Can you see this clearly, Mr. Monroe?
Yeah, it doesn't prove anything.
It proves no one had a scan
at the time you say your daughter was here.
-[officer 1] Makes sense. -[Lucado] Excuse me.
You can see this, right?
Yeah, she wasn't here, because they never brought her here.
translation.ko: 페리를 안 데려왔으니까 여기 온 적 없죠

translation.en: She didn't have a CAT scan. They just took her somewhere else.
translation.ko: CT를 찍은 게 아니라 다른 곳으로 데려갔어요

translation.en: Where?
[scoffs] I don't know.
And why?
I don't know. You're the detective, you figure it out.
I just know that there's something wrong with this place.
translation.ko: 난 이 병원이 이상하다는 것밖에 몰라요

translation.en: Dr. Berthram, who was attending this morning,
will be here shortly.
Good. Maybe he can clear all this up.
Oh, I certainly hope so.
-[Anne] And there you go. -Thanks.
-What's your name, baby? -Anne.
Hmm. So, Anne... double shifts?
Single gal's gotta make a living.
[officer 2] You ever sleep? What time you get off tonight?
translation.ko: 잠은 자요? 오늘 몇 시까지 일해요?

translation.en: [officer 1] Okay, well, this is him. Ray Monroe.
Found this in the trash out front. It's the morning sign-in list.
translation.ko: 접수대 앞 쓰레기통에서 찾은 아침 접수 환자 목록이에요

translation.en: [sighs] Here's my name. There's my name.
Ray, it's... it's your name.
-I signed in for Peri. -No, you signed in for yourself.
translation.ko: - 페리 때문에 접수했어요 - 당신 때문에 했죠

translation.en: What's going on, Aaron?
Anne said something about missing patients.
-You know me, right? Remember? -All right, back off.
All right? You saw my little girl, all right?
You-- You treated her arm. You-- You--
-[officer 1] Do you remember this man? -[Ray] Tell 'em!
Tell them, please!
I do. He was here earlier today.
-Yes! Yes! -[officer 1] All right.
And what were the circumstances?
[Lucado] We have been all through this-- I'm talking to Dr. Berthram.
-What were the circumstances? -Uh...
He was, um...
He was a walk-in, and one of our doctors, Bruce Volk,
translation.ko: 예약 없이 왔고 브루스 볼크라는 의사가

translation.en: um, he examined him.
He told Anne that he had been in a car accident.
translation.ko: 이 사람은 앤에게 교통사고를 당했다고 했어요

translation.en: [Berthram] His behavior seemed rather... erratic.
Dr. Volk asked me to take a look.
translation.ko: 볼크 선생이 나한테 봐 달라고 했죠

translation.en: So I suggested maybe doing a head CT, which he refused.
translation.ko: 그래서 머리 CT 촬영을 권했는데 환자가 거부했어요

translation.en: He insisted on going back out to the lobby to wait for his wife.
-Wh-- What was her name? -[Anne] Abby.
Abby was her name.
Thought you said your wife's name was Joanne.
-It is. -[officer 2] Then who's Abby?
She's my first wife.
Where's Abby now?
[sniffles] She's dead.
She died.
She had nothing to do with Joanne and Peri.
Joanne and Peri?
Who he claims is his current wife and child.
This is real.
This is Joanne, and this is Peri.
Periwinkle. You remember? Because that's Joanne's favorite shell.
And that's my family, and I love them.
[officer 1] What does your first wife have to do
translation.ko: 첫 번째 부인이랑 무슨 상관이 있죠?

translation.en: -with any of this? -[Ray] Nothin'.
translation.ko: 첫 번째 부인이랑 무슨 상관이 있죠? 없다니까요

translation.en: You got Abby's name from the insurance information, right?
And you're just using it against me to make me look crazy,
translation.ko: 날 미친놈으로 만들려고 그 이름을 떠들어 대잖아요

translation.en: when, in reality,
you've kidnapped my family, and you've done something to 'em.
[Jeff] All right, enough. Enough.
Okay, there's a simple enough way to confirm or deny any of this guy's bullshit.
translation.ko: 이 사람의 헛소리는 쉽게 확인할 수 있어요

translation.en: Right there.
This is today's waiting room feed.
What time did you say you came in with your family?
[Ray] Late morning.
So, we'll start at 9:00 a.m.
Work our way forward from there until we see you.
[Ray] Stop. Stop.
-Go back. -[player whirs]
Okay, this is me coming in, and Joanne was carrying Peri behind me.
translation.ko: 여기 내가 들어오고 있고 조앤이 뒤에서 페리를 안고 와요

translation.en: All right, there I am. Right.
This is where she said wait. Um, I went back to the seating area.
translation.ko: 여기서 아내가 기다리라고 했고 난 대기실로 갔어요

translation.en: [officer 1] What are those? Those little glitches?
[Jeff] It's an older system.
Records 30 seconds out of every minute, so there's gonna be gaps.
That's pretty convenient.
-[officer 1] Well, where's your family? -[Ray] They're right there. Just--
Can you-- They're under the camera.
You can't see where they're sitting 'cause of the chairs.
You got a better angle?
The ones you see are the ones that are workin' out there.
translation.ko: 지금 보시는 게 대기실을 찍은 거예요

translation.en: -Just fast forward, fast forward. -[player whirs]
[Ray] Stop.
All right, there I am coming back. That's after Peri went for the CAT scan.
translation.ko: 저게 페리를 검사실로 보내고 돌아오는 나예요

translation.en: [Jeff] Yeah. Never saw you go in with 'em, though.
translation.ko: 근데 당신이 가족과 들어오는 장면은 없어요

translation.en: Your security system is shit.
You've got nothing of my family going in.
translation.ko: 우리 가족이 들어온 게 안 찍혔잖아요

translation.en: -Excuse me. -[Ray] This is just shit!
Do you have any footage from inside the ER?
[Lucado] We don't record in the treatment areas. Uh, legal reasons, patient privacy.
translation.ko: 환자들 사생활 보호를 위해 진료 구역엔 CCTV가 없어요

translation.en: [Berthram] Is Dr. Jacobs on call?
Check the hallways. Check the hallways. Check 'em, all right?
You have better camera placement in the hall.
We're gonna be here all fuckin' night.
-[Ray] Search the hospital! -[officer 1] Okay, that's not happening.
First, we would need a warrant. Then we would need probable cause,
and there's nothing on that video that proves anyone is even missing.
You think that I'm faking? You think I'm making them up?
translation.ko: 그럼 이게 다 내가 지어낸 얘기란 말이에요?

translation.en: I showed you the picture!
That could be anybody.
Your sister, niece.
I mean, the person you keep talking about is Abby.
I don't keep talking about Abby. You keep talking about Abby.
translation.ko: 애비 얘기는 내가 아니라 그쪽이 했죠

translation.en: Come on. Come on, Ray. You got this.
translation.ko: 침착해, 레이 네가 해결할 수 있어

translation.en: The cashier at the service station where Peri fell,
she saw us together.
There's a Gas and Go, it's a couple of miles from here. Ask her.
translation.ko: '개스 앤 고'라고 여기서 몇 킬로 거리죠 그 여자한테 물어봐요

translation.en: -Ask her. -Uh-huh.
-I'll see if I can track her down. -[Ray] Thank you.
Okay.
-[sighs] -[Berthram] Mr. Monroe,
I think we found someone back in the ward that can help us clear everything up.
translation.ko: 병동에는 모든 의혹을 풀어 줄 사람이 있을 거예요

translation.en: Let's go.
Let's go, then.
Call if you need backup.
It's Peri's.
This is Peri's scarf.
Jo gave it to me.
It must've dropped out when we were here this morning.
Can you prove it in some way?
-I mean, is her name on the tag? -It's hers!
-[officer 1] Is there a receipt? -It's hers.
[officer 1] Can I see it, please?
Yes. Just, gentle...
Gentle.
Is this her blood too?
It's... It's my blood.
It's my blood from my head when we fell into the pit.
You know that.
[Berthram] Look, with a head injury....
it's not uncommon to be confused or to mix things up,
and you're obviously confused.
No, no, no.
Why would I have my daughter's scarf and not her?
translation.ko: 내가 왜 페리 목도리를 갖고 있겠어요?

translation.en: And this is her scarf
'cause she had it in the car when we were coming back from Thanksgiving,
translation.ko: 추수감사절 만찬 후에 돌아오는 차에서 두르고 있었죠

translation.en: and she wanted some batteries, so we stopped in a service station.
She fell, she went in the hole, and I fell in on top of her,
translation.ko: 페리가 구덩이로 떨어져서 나도 같이 뛰어내렸고

translation.en: and that's where she got the blood.
And then we came here because she had a broken arm, and she--
translation.ko: 그리고 팔이 부러져서 이 병원에 왔어요!

translation.en: We saw you and--
Stop! Get your shit together, man, or you going to jail!
translation.ko: 그만해요! 감옥에 가두기 전에 정신 차리라고요!

translation.en: Do you understand?
You understand? Get it together.
[woman] Hello, Ray.
I'm Dr. Teresa Jacobs.
I work in the psychiatric department for the county.
You're a shrink?
I prefer "medical counselor," but...
"shrink," sure.
[sighs] I am not crazy.
No one is saying that you are.
I'd like to help you find out what happened to Joanne and Peri.
We're as concerned about them as you are.
-I doubt that. -You should think about listening, man.
Officer, thank you. I can handle this now.
You want to come somewhere more private and talk about this?
Yeah.
Good.
Come on, then.
So, I thought you might be happy to know
they found your admissions file.
Yeah.
Oh, finally.
It's, um, your file, Ray, not your daughter's.
translation.ko: 이건 당신 딸이 아니라 당신 파일이에요

translation.en: There's no mention of Peri in here.
[sniffles] No, it's just bullshit that they just made up.
I was hoping you could talk a bit about what happened
before the car accident.
[sniffles] It wasn't a car accident.
She fell at a construction site.
Okay, sorry, I only know what's in here.
Maybe you could tell me what you remember.
I remember everything. Don't treat me like I'm crazy.
translation.ko: 난 다 기억하니까 정신병자 취급하지 마요

translation.en: [Jacobs] I am treating you as a rational human being, Ray.
translation.ko: 난 당신을 이성적인 사람으로 대하고 있어요

translation.en: Right now, all I've got to go on is your word that they were here at all.
translation.ko: 지금 가족이 여기 있었다는 건 당신의 주장일 뿐이고요

translation.en: There's this.
This proves that they were here...
and that they are hiding them.
He's just hiding everything--
Hiding... what?
That your wife and little girl came in at random for treatment?
translation.ko: 당신 아내랑 딸은 어쩌다 진료를 받으러 왔잖아요?

translation.en: Why would we do that?
Oh, you work here, you tell me.
Tell me about Abby.
She was your first wife?
It's not got anything to do with Abby.
-And she died? -[Ray] Yeah.
Eight years ago.
Why don't you tell me what happened?
[Ray sighs] It was an accident.
[stammers] She-- It was a head-on collision.
Car accident?
[Ray] Yeah.
This has nothing to do with this...
or my family now.
In the file, you mentioned a drinking problem.
That day, Ray,
had you been drinking?
-[Abby] Ray! Ray! [screams] -[glass shatters]
[Jacobs] When the accident happened, Ray,
were you too drunk to help Abby?
[Ray] You didn't even see.
You didn't see it.
Nothing could help her.
I couldn't.
Have you ever had blackouts, Ray?
-Moments of missing time? -Oh, God.
I don't drink. I don't drink anymore.
-I haven't had a drink in eight years. -[Jacobs] Why...
translation.ko: 8년 동안 한 방울도 입에 안 댔죠

translation.en: did you tell the staff that you were waiting for Abby, Ray?
translation.ko: 그럼 왜 의료진한테 애비를 기다린다고 했어요?

translation.en: Help me understand all this.
[sobbing] Abby died in a car accident eight years ago,
and it kills me.
Every day. It just...
-[sniffles, takes a deep breath] -All right.
I'm gonna say something,
and it's gonna be hard to hear.
But you have to listen, Ray,
because I believe you.
I believe something happened to Peri and Joanne...
translation.ko: 나도 페리랑 조앤한테 무슨 일이 생겼다고 생각해요

translation.en: Which is why...
I think we should take a look at the spot
where Peri had her accident.
Why? There's nothing there.
[Jacobs] I think it's a good idea, Ray.
If you'll excuse me for a moment, hmm?
[Jacobs] He's obviously experiencing some deep trauma.
He's confused.
I suggest going back to the place he claims his daughter was hurt.
translation.ko: 레이의 딸이 다쳤다는 곳에 가 보세요

translation.en: What are you thinking?
They might still be out there.
[Berthram] Oh, God.
I'll, uh, put a call into the canine unit and see if they can meet us
translation.ko: 경찰견 부대에 연락해서 주유소에서 만나자고 하죠

translation.en: -at the gas station. -[Jacobs] Mm-hmm.
The place is closed,
but I've got dispatch trying to track down the cashier.
Um, it might be good for us if you come along.
-Of course. -[Ray] They're not out there.
Maybe you're all in on this, or maybe you're not.
The fact is, my wife and daughter went down a hallway in this hospital
translation.ko: 내 아내랑 딸은 이 병원 어딘가로 가서

translation.en: and never came back,
and that's what happened.
[officer 1] Is that it, up ahead?
Yeah.
[officer 1] Thanks for coming so quickly.
[officer 3] No problem. What have you got?
[officer 1] Two missing persons, a woman and child.
[officer 3] You got an incident site?
Ray, where did your daughter fall?
[officer 3] Got a scent source for Mandy?
Can I see that scarf, Ray?
The only thing that dog's gonna smell is that we were here earlier.
translation.ko: 경찰견은 우리가 여기 왔었다는 것만 알겠죠

translation.en: We have to start somewhere, Ray.
[officer 3] Mandy, find.
[officer 3] Good girl. Good girl.
-[Jacobs] What happened here, Ray? -Nothing.
Just, Peri lost a compact, you know? This tiny toy mirror,
translation.ko: 페리가 콤팩트를 잃어버렸을 뿐이죠 작은 장난감 거울인데

translation.en: and she was upset, so...
me and Jo, we looked for it.
She looked in the bathroom, I looked in the car, and then...
translation.ko: 아내는 화장실을 찾아봤고 난 차 안을 살피느라

translation.en: and I lost sight of her for a second.
And I look up, and there's this dog growlin' at her,
translation.ko: 근데 눈을 들어보니 개가 페리를 겁줘서

translation.en: and she spooked and fell.
It was nothing.
[officer 3] Here we go. I think she's got something.
We got something.
[Jacobs] Come on.
[Ray] Let me see it. Let me see it. Please.
Please. Just give that to me. It's Peri's. That's what Peri lost.
translation.ko: 그냥 주세요 그게 페리가 잃어버린 거예요

translation.en: Please, that's Peri's compact.
Must have just been in her pocket the whole time,
and it just fell out when she fell. [chuckles, sighs]
[officer 2] And the blood? That's your daughter's blood?
It's my blood. I hit my head.
-Oh, it's yours? You hit your head. -[Ray] Yeah.
That's way too much blood!
That's my blood. I hit my head, man, look at--
-Look! Look at it! -Get the fuck off me, you crazy fuck!
-Hey! -[officer 2] No more.
This is a crime scene now.
-Go call the CSI unit. -Fuckin' nuts, man.
[officer 1] Keep on looking. There might be more.
He planted it. He planted the mirror!
He planted it.
Did he plant the blood too?
Maybe you did!
-Really? -Officer. Just give us a second here.
translation.ko: - 진심이에요? - 경관님 잠깐 자리 좀 비켜 주세요

translation.en: You gotta help me. You see what's happening here?
translation.ko: 제발 날 도와줘요 일이 이상하게 돌아가잖아요

translation.en: -You gotta help me. -[Jacobs] I am trying to help you, Ray.
Now, I asked you once before. Let me ask you again...
what happened before the accident?
-Were you upset about something? -[breathing shakily]
U-Upset at your daughter, maybe?
[Ray] I was...
I had a fight with my wife about my marriage.
So, I know that she's not happy.
I know that she just wants me to try harder. And I do try hard!
translation.ko: 제가 더 노력하길 원하죠 근데 나도 애쓰거든요!

translation.en: I told Peri, "Just stay there." Right? "Just stay right there."
translation.ko: 난 페리한테 움직이지 말고 가만있으라고 했어요

translation.en: And she didn't listen, and she should have listened!
translation.ko: 근데 페리가 내 말을 안 들었죠!

translation.en: So you were angry with her.
Yeah, I was angry. I picked up a rock, and I threw it.
At who?
[sobs] At-- [stammers] At the dog.
I tried hard.
I tried really hard to-- to-- to- to grab her.
She still fell.
Ray...
are you sure there was a dog?
[Jacobs] There was no dog, was there, Ray?
There was no accident.
Peri didn't fall.
-You made that all up. -[Ray mutters]
It happened!
It's-- That's all that happened.
[Jacobs] Think, Ray.
You were upset at your daughter,
angry at your wife,
angry at yourself.
So you picked up a rock.
[Jacobs] When it was over,
you were so angry at yourself at what you'd done...
translation.ko: 자기가 한 짓 때문에 스스로 화가 났는데...

translation.en: Then Joanne appears.
[Jo] Ray!
[Jacobs] So you... lash out.
[Jo screams] No! No!
That's what happened, isn't it, Ray?
-Are you hurt? -[Jacobs] The mind, Ray,
it can sometimes create an alternate reality, a false reality,
translation.ko: 대체 현실을 만들어 내곤 해요 가짜 세계요

translation.en: to shield itself from trauma.
-[Peri screams] -[Jacobs] From the things we fear,
from the horrors we can't even imagine.
Is it broken?
[Jacobs] You lost your family once before,
and when you saw what you'd done to Peri... and then Joanne,
translation.ko: 그리고 페리와 조앤에게 한 짓을 자각하자

translation.en: your mind couldn't accept the fact that it had happened all over again.
translation.ko: 또다시 가족을 잃었다는 사실을 감당할 수 없었죠

translation.en: And at your hands.
I would never hurt you, sweetie.
Where are they, Ray?
Where are Peri and Joanne?
Where did you put them?
Ray?
Ray?
[officer 1] Stand up, Mr. Monroe.
Stand up, Mr. Monroe!
Stand up.
Get up, right now.
Mr. Monroe, you are under arrest for the suspicion of murder.
translation.ko: 먼로 씨, 당신을 살인 혐의로 체포하겠습니다

translation.en: -You have the right to remain silent. -[Mandy barking]
Anything you say can and will be used against you in a court of law.
translation.ko: 당신이 하는 말은 법정에서 불리하게 쓰일 수 있습니다

translation.en: You have the right to an attorney. If you can not afford an attorney,
[Peri] Daddy!
[Ray] Don't move.
It's going to be okay. I'm just gonna scare him.
Daddy!
-[Peri screams] -No!
[Ray] Are you hurt?
I don't think so.
It happened.
[Jacobs] No, Ray!
Put it down. Put it down. Put down all your guns.
-Okay-- -[Ray] Do it now. Now!
Now!
Put down your guns and your radios and kick 'em away.
-You too! -You know you're fucking yourself, right?
translation.ko: 당신도요! 이러면 당신만 곤란해지는 거 알죠?
